name: EWSR1-FLI1 Fusion
title: EWSR1-FLI1 Fusion
notes:
**Note 1:** This SSDI is effective for diagnosis years 2024+.
* For cases diagnosed 2018-2023, leave this SSDI blank

**Note 2:** EWS-FLI1 fusion occurs in about 90% of Ewing Sarcomas and functions as both a pioneering transcription factor and potent oncogene.
* Primary sources of information: molecular pathology report (may be addendum to original pathology report), CAP protocol

**Note 3:** Physician statement of the EWSR1-FLI1 fusion can be used to code this data item
rows: EWSR1 rearrangement present, fusion partner not known
Test ordered, results not in chart
